title: Maple or Plane Tree?
text:
The debate has sparked over whether maple leaves or plane tree leaves would be a better roof covering for the train carriages. 
${E1}.name believes that the platanus tree is more aesthetically pleasing. 
${E2}.name believes that promoting invasive species should be avoided.

options.text: Go to another room and wait.

title: Sticky situaction
text: ${E1}.name spilled on herself “Handy Glue: Bonds Forever”. Her shirt has a new ugly pattern.

title: Disagreement
text: ${E1}.name is at odds with your team leadership. How do you manage this disagreement?

options.text: Explain why you should be leader

title: Old Conflicts
text: ${E1}.name wants to talk about an old disagreement she had with you.

options.text: Explain how you were right then.
Tell her that the past is past

title: Wardrobe Return
text: ${E1}.name wants to talk about broken doors to her wardrobe

title: Big Dream
text: ${E1}.name tells you about her the biggest dream. She wants to be the first woman to land on the sun.

options.text: Cupcake, I believe in your success
